channel.title: Age of Ravens: History of Licensed RPGs (Part VI 1999-2000)
channel.description: On The Gauntlet Blog I return to my series examining ttrpgs based on existing properties. It's a wild run: from multiple *Dragonballs* to *Diablo* to *Demon City Shinjuku* to *Dune* to *Ghost Dog* to *Starcraft.* Also has links to my previous installments as well as my history lists for horror, steampunk & victoriana, post-apocalyptic, universal, superhero, and more. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/history-of-licensed-rpgs-part-vi-1999-2000

item.title: Age of Ravens: History of Licensed RPGs (Part VI 1999-2000)
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

On The Gauntlet Blog I return to my series examining ttrpgs based on existing properties. It’s a wild run: from multiple Dragonballs to Diablo to Demon City Shinjuku to Dune to Ghost Dog to Starcraft. Also has links to my previous installments as well as my history lists for horror, steampunk & victoriana, post-apocalyptic, universal, superhero, and more.

THE GAUNTLET

History of Licensed RPGs (Part VI 1999-2000)

ONE YEAR LATER I’m back these lists again, and not a moment too soon. We’ve had a variety of high profile license announcements lately: Rivers of London, Dragon Prince, Hellboy, Legends of...

Read full topic
item.source: Age of Ravens: History of Licensed RPGs (Part VI 1999-2000)
